com.durbha.jc.pwhasher

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.durbha.jc.pwhasher.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration of the application. Comes with default values.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.net.InetAddress ipToListenTo
      IP address to listen to
      (package private) int maxCapacity
      This is the size of the request buffer, this many requests will be buffered waiting for a thread to become available to process it.

      Number of threads, that will process inbound requests.

      Port to listen to

    • Field Detail

      • numberOfThreads

        int numberOfThreads
        Number of threads, that will process inbound requests. Has a default value of 10.

      • maxCapacity

        int maxCapacity
        This is the size of the request buffer, this many requests will be buffered waiting for a thread to become available to process it.
